testcase.classname: Verification of GRN Data after submitting the Daily In Input
testcase.name: Navigate to GRN Data and Verify the data is displaying for IPO or not
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then Click on the Audit module..............................................passed Then Click on GRN data screen...............................................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed And Click on the Filter Icon................................................passed Then Select the Merchant and Supplier.......................................passed And click on Apply button and Reset button..................................passed And Select the IPO in Style expansion.......................................passed When user selects the Ipo verify the Ipo details which are displayed on the screen or not.passed Then verify the grid is displaying or not...................................passed And Verify the expansion icon is displaying or not..........................passed And Click on expansion icon.................................................passed Then verify the data is displaying in the expansion grid or not.............passed And validate the expansion grid data........................................passed
